name: Hazirawn
entries: A sentient (neutral evil) greatsword, Hazirawn is capable of speech in Common and Netherese. Even if you aren't attuned to the sword, you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. If you are not attuned to Hazirawn, you deal an extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage when you hit with the weapon.

entries.name: Increased Potency
entries: While you are attuned to this weapon, its bonus on attack and damage rolls increases to +2, and a hit deals an extra {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage (instead of {@dice 1d6}).

entries.name: Spells
entries: Hazirawn has 4 charges to cast spells. As long as the sword is attuned to you and you are holding it in your hand, you can cast {@spell detect magic} (1 charge), {@spell detect evil and good} (1 charge), or {@spell detect thoughts} (2 charges). Each night at midnight, Hazirawn regains {@dice 1d4} expended charges.

entries.name: Wounding
entries: While you are attuned to the weapon, any creature that you hit with Hazirawn can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.
